name: My Little Pony: A Very Pony Place
summary: My Little Pony: A Very Pony Place is a Direct-to-Video Animated film produced by SD Entertainment and distributed by Paramount Home Entertainment in association with Hasbro. The film is the fourth of the Generation 3 My Little Pony films and the first to have three separate stories in one feature. It was released on February 6, 2007 and received favorable reviews from critics.
